full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I ZAB 'KHRID MDOR BSDUS PHAN BDE'I LAM BZANG GI SNGON 'GRO SBYOR BA'I CHOS DRUG RGYAS PAR BYED TSUL GYI 'DON SGRIGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI YANG RANG GI BSTI GNAS SGRUB SDE YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN GLING DU BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I ZAB 'KHRID KYI NGAG 'DON GSAR DU 'DZUGS SKABS, CHOS GRVA PA RNAMS KYI 'DON SGRIGS SU ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,^NA MO GU RU, ,MDO SNGAGS LAM BZANG KUN GYI GZHIR GYUR BA, ,RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KUN GYI SNYING PO'I DON, ,GCIG TU BSGRIL NAS NYAMS SU LEN PA'I TSUL, ,BYANG CHUB LAM RIM PHAN BDE'I LAM BZANG GI ,SBYOR BA'I CHOS DRUG DKYUS LAS RGYAS BYED TSUL, ,ZUR DU BKOD PA'I SBYOR CHOS 'DON BSGRIGS 'DI, ,DAD LDAN DGE SLONG CHOS KYI GRAGS PA YIS, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL PHYIR PAR DU BSGRUB, ,DGE BA 'DI YIS TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU, ,THEG MCHOG DGE BA'I BSHES KYIS RJES BZUNG NAS, ,LAM BZANG 'DI NYID GOMS PA MTHAR PHYIN TE, ,'GRO KUN SGROL PHYIR RNAM MKHYEN MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,) @013B TAR HANG DGE SLONG 'OD ZER BZANG PO SOGS, ,LAM RIM YONG RDZOGS PAR DU BRKOBS PA GYIS, THAR BA DON GNYER BDAG GZHAN 'GRO BA KUN, BLA MED BYANG CHUB GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,
